title: Looking for T207 Napoleon Max Carey
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Looking for T207 Napoleon Max Carey
posts.post_content:
I prefer a GD+/VG card, but obviously can't be too picky with this search.  I can buy or trade (if you happen to want other Napoleons or T206s).

Please let me know if you have you could part with.  Thanks!
